snippet.title: Zombie Rollerz Closed Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Sign up here: https://goo.gl/forms/vJbwdiRAP5EEeNZD3

When was the last time you played a pinball game? Zombie Rollerz enhances the genre by merging pinball with tower defense. Many different types of zombies are waiting for you to challenge them! Choose your heroes, power up your pinball, and crush everything in your way! 

Features available in closed beta:
- 30+ challenging PVE levels.
- 10+ brain teasing puzzle levels.
- 6 available heroes with different ball effects and elemental powers.
- 10+ types of zombies and elite variations.
- Epic boss fights.
- Endless survival mode.
